title: Google Pay on Pixel 4 XL requires me to unlock the phone twice every time
content:
Not sure if this is a common problem or if it's just me, but every time I use my P4XL to pay in-store I end up having to tap my phone twice on the POS before the transaction goes though. Basically, each transaction goes like this:

Unlock phone and open Google Pay through power menu
Wave phone at contactless card reader
Get error message that I need to authorize payment using my face and transaction stops
Awkward moment between me and the cashier until they notice they need to hit some sort of redo button so I can try paying again
Wave phone at contactless card reader a second time
Transaction complete

Correct me if I'm wrong, but shouldn't this be a more seamless process? I should be able to just wave the phone once and be done if I already have the phone unlocked right?

I imagine I never had this issue on my pixel 2XL because I could hold my fingerprint on the reader as I tapped to pay. The same cannot be done with face unlock.

Credit to chrispgriffin on Reddit for describing the issue. I am copying his post as it describes the issue I have perfectly since getting a Pixel 4 XL. 

There is no Google Pay support forum so I'm posting here as it relates to Face Unlock.
